Name: Cafe IJzicht
Review Text: This was an amazing discovery. I came here in a cold December night and the place was full of people drinking, dancing and playing pool. I spent an awesome night here. If you want to feel to real Dutch spirit don't miss this place.

Name: Cafe IJzicht
Review Text: This is a typical dutch brown bar on a very beautiful quiet street that does not feel like the busy amsterdam you might know. Ideal for sunny summer nights.

Name: Cafe IJzicht
Review Text: Charmingly rustic place. Could not handle payment using Visa or Mastercard (claimed to never heard of them), had to pay cash.

Name: Cafe IJzicht
Review Text: Love this cosy traditional pub in Amsterdam noord region. Best apple tart!
